mapper.insert: INSERT INTO binance_agg_trade (symbol, agg_trade_id, price, quantity, first_trade_id, last_trade_id, trade_time, buyer_maker, created_at) VALUES (#{symbol}, #{aggTradeId}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{firstTradeId}, #{lastTradeId}, #{tradeTime}, #{buyerMaker}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE price = VALUES (price), quantity = VALUES (quantity), trade_time = VALUES (trade_time), buyer_maker = VALUES (buyer_maker), created_at = NOW();
